product_name: Victorinox Limited Edition Vertical Zip Daypack
long_description: Stylish and sleek, the Victorinox Vertical Zip Daypack is an ultra-spacious padded computer pack with divided organization. It holds everything you need for trips to the office or the gym. Padded rear laptop compartment holds up to a 17 in. laptop. 10 in. padded portable electronic device pocket protects a tablet or e-reader. Interior organization includes full-length zippered mesh pocket, dual storage pockets, pen slots and key fob. Exterior organization includes vertical-zip front pocket and multi-purpose, zip-close stretch side pockets ideal for a water bottle or umbrella. Molded back panel and adjustable shoulder straps maximize comfort; adjustable sternum strap evenly distributes weight. Victorinox Vertical Zip Daypack is made from durable nylon fabric with an abrasion-resistant, reinforced base. Limited edition green camo print incorporates the Victorinox logo; bright orange accents and lining add pop. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Stylish and sleek, the Victorinox Vertical Zip Daypack is an ultra-spacious padded computer pack with divided organization. It holds everything you need for trips to the office or the gym.
